mapper.sql: id, title, article_url, account_id, account_name, structure_type, keywords, topicTitle, topicId, article_tags, publish_time, read_num, relative_score, article_url
mapper.select: select daily.id, daily.title, daily.account_id, daily.account_name, article.structure_type, daily.article_tags, daily.publish_time, daily.read_num,daily.relative_score,article.keywords,article.article_url from wxarticlerankdaily daily inner join wxarticleinfo article on article.article_id = daily.article_id left join WxArticleRelatedTopic arti_topic on arti_topic.article_id = article.id left join ( select id as topicId,title as topicTitle from view_topic ) topic on topic.topicId = arti_topic.topic_id where daily.is_latest = 1 order by daily.relative_score DESC LIMIT #{rowStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
